scripts.build:staging: node scripts/validate-env.cjs staging && vite build --mode staging
scripts.build:prod: node scripts/validate-env.cjs production && vite build --mode production
scripts.check:staging: if grep -q 'VITE_APP_ENV=staging' .env.staging; then echo '✅ Environment is Staging'; else echo '❌ FOUT: Verkeerde env file!'; exit 1; fi
scripts.check:prod: if grep -q 'VITE_APP_ENV=production' .env.production; then echo '✅ Environment is Production'; else echo '❌ FOUT: Verkeerde env file!'; exit 1; fi
scripts.release:staging: npm run check:staging && npm run build:staging && firebase deploy --only hosting --project ddd-spark
scripts.release:prod: npm run check:prod && npm run build:prod && firebase deploy --only hosting --project dans-dichter-db
